original_text: I will bring you to a wilderness with other nations all around it. I will meet with you there and I will show that you are guilty.
korean_text: 너희를 인도하여 여러 나라 광야에 이르러 거기에서 너희를 대면하여 심판하되

sentences.original_text: I will bring you to a wilderness
with other nations all around it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 주위에 다른 민족들이 있게 하겠다

sentences.original_text: I will meet with you there
and I will show that you are guilty
